Technetium

01 Apr 2014

Technetium is a Bitbucket Data aggregation tool built using Bitbucket’s RESTful API. Features a centalized issue tracker, repository subscription manager, and reports/graphs which enumerates the commit/issue activity of each user in a subscribed repository. [read more]

Fire Emblem

30 Mar 2014

Fire Emblem - Chronicles of the Abyss is a JavaScript remake of Fire Emblem - Blazing Sword built on top of the ImpactJS Game Engine, purely for educational purposes. The motivation for this project is to explore the capabilities of ImpactJS and push the boundaries of the engine, as well as to create a long-time favorite game. [read more]
